title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 463.3 - Responsibility for prompt payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 463.3 - Responsibility for prompt payment

State Regulations

The controller shall have the responsibility for the
implementation of the prompt payment policy and the prompt payment of all
proper invoices under the general guidance and supervision of the Executive

Vice President, Finance and Administration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
463.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
